types.html:
du ressort de

  1. within the competence of, under the jurisdiction of
    être du ressort de quelqu'un ― to be the responsibility of someone, to fall within the competence of someone, to come under the jurisdiction of someone

See also

[edit]
  • dépendre de
trans: within the competence of, under the jurisdiction of

title: du ressort de
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /dy ʁ(ə).sɔʁ də/
